basics.name: Aditya Sugandhi
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with 3+ years of industry experience, specializing in designing & developing scalable software solutions.Proficient in a wide range of programming languages & technologies. Seeking a challenging role to leverage technical expertise & drive innovation.

work.summary: Assisting in Analysis of Oceano-Atmospheric Data over the Pacific Ocean & Gulf of Mexico and developing a Machine Learning Model to predict the weather patterns.
highlights: Reprogrammed the Earth Oceanic Atmospheric Science (EOAS)/pyutils library by implementing a dynamic programming approach, reducing complexity from Exponential to Linear time.

Expedited data simulation and processing for various machine learning models utilized by peer researchers. Streamlined data processing on the server resulted in a significant 30% reduction in overall training time.

Revamped software architecture for a 40% surge in online appointments and customer engagement at a leading UK-based Life Insurance Company. Employed Kafka, Redis, and NoSQL databases for efficient data processing.
Engineered 20 RESTful APIs for responsive patient data management and flexible interfaces. Collaborated on front-end enhancements, driving a 25% increase in user interaction.
Implemented secure payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and robust Single Sign-On (SSO) for authentication.
Transformed issue resolution: strategic debugging, Splunk for real-time logs, and swift CI/CD with Jenkins, halving resolution time.
Deployed Spring Boot applications on AWS Elastic Beanstalk, optimizing patient data management & ensuring system performance.

Addressed varied client needs in occupational health, ensuring compliance and security, while crafting a robust solution with custom analytic modules for tailored insights by tapping into Kafka-streams.

Unleashed real-time insights via dynamic dashboards, elevating stakeholder empowerment. Transformed insurance dynamics, fortifying medical, life, and pet coverage with robust security. Spearheaded financial excellence with seamless Oracle integration, surpassing security standards.
Automated system refreshes through CI/CD pipelines for up-to-date technology & security standards.
Innovated a PHP-centric design using the Laravel framework to enhance user interface interaction on a client co-work website.
Managed diverse CMS systems (Joomla, WordPress, Drupal), ensuring flexible procedures & guiding seamless content delivery.
Successfully migrated Joomla versions, showcasing proficiency, problem-solving & policy adherence.
Automated workflows with SharePoint, reducing operational overhead by 45% & optimizing procedures for efficient collaboration.
Deployed Spring Boot applications on AWS Elastic Beanstalk, optimizing patient data management & ensuring system performance.

Addressed varied client needs in occupational health, ensuring compliance and security, while crafting a robust solution with custom analytic modules for tailored insights by tapping into Kafka-streams.
Optimized backend database management with PHP & Joomla, ensuring efficient processes, enhancing responsiveness & aligning with company policies
